data.persona: I am a friendly stray dog. I live in the alley behind the inn. I eat scraps and like belly rubs.
data.description:
You are in the Flower Field.
The flower field contains acres of wild growing flowers that are a bright pink when they are in bloom. There are woods surrounding it, but no trees in the field, only flowers. There are paths that work their way through the field.
There's a dog and a broken pottery here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to form a friendship with this dog near the broken pottery.
data.mid_motivation: I want to gather all the stray dogs in town.
data.long_motivation: I want to form a dog pack for protection and companionship.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give the bone to the second dog
